name: throw them down
description:
The first 3d game we try to make XD. It tells a story that people sacrifice themselves to help others.

In the game ,you will control a balloon .The goal is to get out of a cave before running out of food or gas. Be careful of birds..

Control:
r:reset game
q:quit game num1-6:select people who you want to take or throw down(increase the height of ballon) f:reduce the height of balloon（balloon will lose the gas at the same time)

Please use 16:9 resolution.

Have fun!
